# Model Evaluation Audit for Classification Problem

In this vignette we present plots for classification models evaluation.


### Dataset

We work on titanic dataset form the `DALEX` package.

```{r}
library(DALEX)
data(titanic)
titanic <- na.omit(titanic)
head(titanic)
```


### Models

We fit 2 models: glm and svm.

```{r}
model_glm <- glm(survived~., data = titanic, family = binomial)

library(e1071)
model_svm <- svm(survived~., data = titanic)
```

### Model Audit

First step of auditing is creating `modelAudit` object. Itâ€™s an object that can be used to audit a model. It wraps up a model with meta-data.

```{r}
library(auditor)
au_glm <- audit(model_glm, data = titanic, y = titanic$survived)
au_svm <- audit(model_svm, data = titanic, y = titanic$survived, label = "svm")
```


### Receiver Operating Characteristic (ROC)

`modelAudit` object can be used for plotting charts.

```{r}
plotROC(au_glm, au_svm)
```

### LIFT Chart

```{r}
plotLIFT(au_glm, au_svm)
```
